ELOS-епіляція заснована на поєднанні лаз: ELOS hair removal is based on a combination of laser and photoepilation, supplemented by a special technique for protecting the skin during the procedure. A high-frequency pulse of light and current is directed to the treatment area: the current destroys the hair follicle, and high-frequency light pulses act on the hair structure, evenly distributing the temperature along its shaft In turn, this technology increases the depth of impact on the hair follicles by 20-30%, significantly reducing the degree of thermal effect on the surrounding tissues.
наявність небажаного волосся на тілі - н: the presence of unwanted hair on the body - on the legs, arms, back, face, chest, in the armpits, in the bikini zone
захворювання крові, що призводять до пор: diseases of the blood, leading to a violation of its coagulability
захворювання, що підвищують чутливість ш: diseases that increase the sensitivity of the skin to light
імунодефіцитні стани, в тому числі викли: immunodeficiency states, including those caused by the intake of certain drugs
інфекційні захворювання шкіри в місці еп: infectious diseases of the skin at the place of epilation
прийом ліків, що мають фотосенсибілізуюч: taking medications that have a photosensitizing effect (information about this is always indicated in the annotation to the drug)
наявність імплантів, що мають металеві к: the presence of implants with metal components in the area of ​​epilation
наявність кохлеарного слухового протезу: the presence of a cochlear hearing prosthesis
келоїдні рубці в зоні епіляції: keloid scars in the epilation zone
Метод перманентного видалення волосся за: The method of permanent hair removal using an electric discharge directed directly to the hair follicle. According to the results of clinical studies, electrolysis is the only method of permanent hair removal.
для видалення волосся на шкірі через 8-1: to remove hair on the skin 8-12 months after the treatment of the nevus
для видалення бороди трансгендерним жінк: for beard removal for transgender women
для видалення волосся у жінок в якості с: for hair removal in women as an integral part of the treatment of hirsutism (excessive hair growth)
схильність до утворення келоїдних та гіп: tendency to form keloid and hyperplastic scars
варикоз в зоне епіляції: varicose veins in the epilation zone
непереносимість сплавів метілів, що вход: intolerance to metal alloys that are part of the needles
Це революційна методика боротьби з багат: This is a revolutionary method of dealing with many skin imperfections. During the session, the volume of adipose tissue is reduced, the production of collagen and elastin, which are responsible for the firmness and elasticity of skin tissues, is stimulated. The RF-lifting procedure allows you to: even out the relief, correct facial contours, tighten the contour, smooth wrinkles, eliminate bags under the eyes
системні захворювання з'єднувальної ткан: systemic diseases of the connective tissue (rheumatoid arthritis, systemic lupus erythematosus, vasculitis)
онкологічні процеси будь-якої локалізаці: oncological processes of any localization and stage
хронічні захворювання в стадії загострен: chronic diseases in the acute stage
ELOS-омолодження ґрунтується на унікальн: ELOS rejuvenation is based on a unique combination of two types of energy - light energy and high frequency electric current. With the advent of ELOS technology, it has become possible to have a deeper, and at the same time gentle effect on the skin. As a result, the production of the skin's own elastin complex is stimulated, synthesis of new collagen in its deep layers. This is the same Elos rejuvenation, reviews of which can be heard everywhere today! After all, it is when our skin loses elastin and collagen that it gradually loses its beauty
наявність штучного стимулятора серцевого: the presence of an artificial heart pacemaker, a defibrillator or a cochlear implant
онкологя шкіри або внутрішніх органів в: oncology of the skin or internal organs in the anamnesis
наявність металевих імплантів в зоні лік: the presence of metal implants in the treatment area
імунодефіцитні стані (СНІД, ВІЛ), а тако: immunodeficiency states (AIDS, HIV), as well as the use of immunosuppressants
червона вовчанка, порфірія, ерозія, ерит: lupus erythematosus, porphyria, erosion, erythema, dermatoses
сильна засмага протягом останніх 4 тижні: strong sunburn during the last 4 weeks before treatment
прийом фотосенсибілізуючих препаратів пр: taking photosensitizing drugs during the last 2 weeks before elos-rejuvenation, retinoids in the last 6 months before the procedure
Лазерний карбоновий пілінг - це косметич: Laser Carbon Peeling is a cosmetic machine procedure. Also known as «carbon peeling» due to the use of a special carbon (carbon dioxide) based nanogel. This is a two-component treatment that instantly reduces skin problems such as acne, bacteria and pigmentation, promotes the production of its own collagen and makes the skin more elastic.
жирна шкіра з ознаками акне та постакне: oily skin with signs of acne and post-acne
вугревий висип, комедони (не в активній: acne, comedones (not in the active stage)
нормальна та комбінована шкіра з дрібним: normal and combination skin with small wrinkles
